content: {"name": "Chrill Care Mobile Meals of Essex County", "alternate_name": "", "description": "weekday hot meal delivery is provided to clients who are mostly homebound due to illness, physical limitation, advanced age, or inadequate cooking facilities. The meals are delivered usually between 10:00 a.m. and 2:00 p.m. to the client\u2019s home by trained delivery drivers. Contact our mobile meals manager at (973) 744-0473", "email": "", "url": "https://ccihomecare.com/mobile-meals/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "201 Bloomfield Avenue", "address_2": null, "city": "Verona", "state_province": "NJ", "postal_code": "07044", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 40.8259554, "longitude": -74.2351151}, "phones": [{"number": "(973) 744-8103", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "18:00"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "18:00"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "18:00"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "18:00"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "18:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "For homebound seniors"}]}
